comment._content: Good photo I invite the group / Bona foto et convido al grup - Black Cat / Gat negre

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: "Díaz" reffers to Ciudad Porfirio Díaz, Coahuila, México, former name of Piedras Negras, Coahuila, México, border to Eagle Pass, Texas, USA, where photographer Beach was stablished. See in www.flickr.com/photos/jesusduarte/8480168049/#comments how this place looks today. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon. Torreón, Coahuila, México

comment.author: 41131493@N06
comment._content: Thanks, Dr. Duarte, we have added this information.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: in books.google.com.mx/books?id=ATAHwcN2hhgC&pg=PA68&... page 41, you can read "The first coal mining in Maverik County (Eagle Pass) was in operation prior to 1885..... Importantly though, in February 1883 the Galveston, Harrisburg & San Antonio Railroad completed its Eagle Pass branch, prompting the construction of a permanent bridge over the Rio Grande at Eagle Pass. The bridge conected the GH&SARR with the Mexican International Railroad (MIR) at Piedras Negras, Coahuila, across the river..." Roberto Duarte M D
